Putin warns the West a Russia-NATO conflict is just one step from World War ThreeRussian President Vladimir Putin warned the West on Monday that a direct conflict between Russia and the U.S.-led NATO military alliance would mean the planet was one step away from World War Three but said hardly anyone wanted such a scenario. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:44:49 GMT EKXA2GJCKNPCFCZ6F3TNMXRRRI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-warns-west- Russia-nato-conflict-is-just-one-step-ww3-2024-03-17/Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
North Korea fires ballistic missile as South hosts democracy conferenceNorth Korea fired a ballistic missile into the sea on Monday for the first time in two months, at a time when U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken was visiting Seoul to attend a conference hosted by President Yoon Suk Yeol on advancing democracy. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:12:07 GMT VU2UILXH4NOH7FF65RKK66GHVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korea-fires-ballistic-missile-south-korean-military-says-2024-03-17/Reuters世界
Silver lining: Tutoring the elderly is growing fast in ChinaChina's rapidly aging population is fuelling a promising and fast-growing market for companies providing recreational classes and activities for the elderly middle class, from yoga to African drumming and smartphone photography. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:06:12 GMT BZBLIQEYSJMJVJLL6YEJNZNDAA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/silver-lined-tutoring-elderly-ice-forming-fast-china-2024-03-17/Farah Master, Tingshu Wang, Xiaoyu Yin商业金融
Ukraine says Russia attacks border regions as partial results show Putin reelectionUkraine reported dozens of attacks by Russia near their shared border on Sunday as partial results showed President Vladimir Putin winning reelection by the largest margin since Soviet times. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 22:21:04 GMT 2RP4VEEXQFK6HE4VM7DKBYKMWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says- Russia-attacks-border-regions-partial-results-show-putin-reelection-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Colombia decree suspends ceasefire with EMC armed group in three areasColombia will suspend its months-long ceasefire with the Estado Mayor Central (ECM) armed group in three provinces on Wednesday, a government decree said on Sunday, citing incidents of violence that broke the ceasefire. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 20:00:53 GMT FZCTJSTL2BPTPDGQVVNADOC54U https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-suspends-ceasefire-with-emc-armed-group- Three-areas-decree-2024-03-17/Luis Jaime Acosta世界美洲
Moldova dismisses reported drone strike in breakaway enclave as provocationOfficials in Moldova's pro-Russian, separatist Transdniestria enclave said a drone launched from Ukraine's Odesa region blew up a helicopter on military territory on Sunday, local media said, but pro-European Moldova immediately dismissed the report. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 19:19:00 GMT XI53FREEPJHIDINSKQF25TQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-dismisses-reported-drone-strike-breakaway-enclave-pro Vocation-2024-03-17/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Russians in Latvia vote in presidential election, and some protest against PutinRussian citizens in Latvia cast ballots in their home country's presidential election on Sunday, while opponents of President Vladimir Putin rallied in front of the embassy in Riga in a peaceful "noon against Putin" protest. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:55:56 GMT BKXUVXBSPJI4PHRGXDCMK64OUA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russians-latvia-vote-presidential-election-some-protest-against-putin-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
UNICEF says over 13,000 children killed in Gaza in Israel offensiveThe U.N. children's agency said on Sunday over 13,000 children have been killed in Gaza in Israel's offensive, adding many kids were suffering from severe malnutrition and did not "even have the energy to cry." Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:48:43 GMT Y5GVSBQJ3JK57HNV7A7REQUZ3E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unicef-says-over-13000-children-killed-in-gaza-israeli-offective-2024-03-17/Kanishka Singh世界中东地区
Reactions abroad to Russia's presidential electionFollowing are reactions from foreign governments and officials to Russia's presidential election, which handed Vladimir Putin a landslide win and another six-year term in office, according to first official results on Sunday. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:30:43 GMT M7VPUWBWHZIBLKW2MFW5NEENUM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/reactions- Russian-presidential-election-abroad-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Thousands of Russians vote in Serbia, Montenegro, many say they oppose PutinThousands of Russian citizens in Serbia and Montenegro voted on Sunday in their home nation's presidential election, with many saying it was a symbolic gesture that would not impact President Vladimir Putin's bid for another six-year term. EU's von der Leyen says Gaza facing famine, ceasefire needed rapidlyEuropean Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Sunday that Gaza was facing famine and there had to be a rapid ceasefire agreement in the war between Israel and Hamas.
